*Student Accomplice*
:::

***Student Accomplice*** is the BYU Center for Animation's 2024 short film capstone. I worked as a Pipeline TD on this film, supporting ~40 artists. ***Student Accomplice*** has received the following accolades:

- [**Student Academy Award**](https://press.oscars.org/news/award-placements-revealed-2024-student-academy-awardsr)
- [**College Television Award Nominee**](https://www.televisionacademy.com/news/44-cta-nominees-241204) (still under consideration)
- [***The Rookies* Film of the Year**](https://www.therookies.co/entries/32526)


Read more about what I did on this project here:

::: {#projects}
:::

To read more about the film itself, check out the [project's profile](https://www.therookies.co/entries/32526) on *The Rookies*!

---

As ***Student Accomplice*** is still under consideration for festivals, it is not available for public viewing at this time.
